name: Xiaomi Redmi K90
highlights:
Released 2025, October 23
206g, 8mm thickness
Android 16, HyperOS 3
256GB/512GB/1TB storage, no card slot

BODY: IP68 dust tight and water resistant (immersible up to 1.5m for 30 min)

DISPLAY.Type: LTPO AMOLED, 68B colors, 2560Hz PWM, 120Hz, Dolby Vision, HDR Vivid, HDR10+, 3500 nits (peak)

PLATFORM.CPU: Octa-core (2x4.32 GHz Oryon V2 Phoenix L + 6x3.53 GHz Oryon V2 Phoenix M)

MAIN CAMERA.Triple:
50 MP, f/1.9, 24mm (wide), 1/1.55", 1.0µm, PDAF, OIS
50 MP, f/2.2, 60mm (telephoto), PDAF, 2.5x optical zoom
8 MP, f/2.2, 15mm, 120˚ (ultrawide)
MAIN CAMERA.Features: Color spectrum sensor, LED flash, HDR, panorama

SOUND:
Tuned by Bose
24-bit/192kHz Hi-Res & Hi-Res wireless audio

COMMS.Positioning: GPS (L1+L5), BDS (B1I+B1c+B2a), GALILEO (E1+E5a), QZSS (L1+L5), NavIC, GLONASS

FEATURES.Sensors: Fingerprint (under display, optical), accelerometer, proximity, gyro, compass

BATTERY.Charging:
100W wired, PD3.0, QC3+, 100W PPS
22.5W reverse wireless
